| public type | description |
| --- | --- |
| interface [ICasePhases](./Jds.TestingUtils.Patterns/ICasePhases.md) | Methods which define a test case's pre-assert phases: (1) arrange, (2) acquire sanity values, (3) act, (4) acquire verification values. |
| interface [IDestructiveCase](./Jds.TestingUtils.Patterns/IDestructiveCase.md) | Methods which provide an API to clean up changes made by the test case arrangement. |
